category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_allow_skipped_task_restart
preference.preference_description: Controls the restart behavior of a skipped task. Valid Values: * 1: Restart the skipped task. This is the default value. * 2: Restart the skipped task only if the task has multiple successors. * 3: Do not restart the skipped task.
